#### `f1279ad19a9e0b6acb828a9cfca97ee457af710ef9afa0d1daacad8d6965de2c`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

```dockerfile
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
```

#### `d573848b2569990bbfd8cfaa5bf3220b539d620ef60a717e83e962f455f90a36`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `5fb3e3614a80bee1181beffd2ae572d176795dc1102230908218322d68af9b11`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `5f9e5b2c4c7206719c3c667ae7e2df0fb315365278beefd290d07c855e32b575`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
```

#### `c9e4a959cb9b3b8d7d44fb4a4059a1c58be59110d844297729d228b13da1825d`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `c9e4a959cb9b3b8d7d44fb4a4059a1c58be59110d844297729d228b13da1825d`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
```
```dockerfile
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
```
```dockerfile
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `ed7031918e4788d52dde3865aeee1a44acb157a676414e10c550c68b01d4e444`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `de0179d690e4a5bb093497c8e857622c55ec865998add116d8078c6d1e9a4b96`

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

```dockerfile
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `03ad19b31bff387efd0597d0e2daa4aec5f7abded67170de277b9d95203d309d`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

```dockerfile
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

#### `5e39f298fc7d124c19ab8f61a7a133a7fc081e60241d744c5fb3f10023100a2c`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `6dbac56d2db587f03c097b8ae10623f1094b6384648e2528916ce2c75b3a226b`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `6dbac56d2db587f03c097b8ae10623f1094b6384648e2528916ce2c75b3a226b`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `6dbac56d2db587f03c097b8ae10623f1094b6384648e2528916ce2c75b3a226b`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `ee3f2e46594dc9623cdc521f42bf4e8331c60fc3bedcf1de97ed1cd4ac366831`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `ee3f2e46594dc9623cdc521f42bf4e8331c60fc3bedcf1de97ed1cd4ac366831`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `a4f80526e77cd8d0ab298e4e825a9f4b8789306c6e87596542054f5dc75b4636`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `16e60f53c2082b3c755876e4adcccce2e9c0e457f804cec5f05f436318b537a2`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

```dockerfile
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \

		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

#### `6b340daacc01f07f75ba887c3af4d2c7b2c9f771e058b62b348f4a816300c366`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```

#### `3229b70a0abeedf9991bd81727917aab11fbc0b2359d92236df80dd446de053a`

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \
		cp php-fpm.d/www.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
	else \
		mkdir php-fpm.d; \
		cp php-fpm.conf.default php-fpm.d/www.conf; \
		{ \
			echo '[global]'; \
			echo 'include=etc/php-fpm.d/*.conf'; \
		} | tee php-fpm.conf; \
	fi \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \
	&& { \
		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

```dockerfile
RUN set -ex \
	&& cd /usr/local/etc \
	&& if [ -d php-fpm.d ]; then \
		sed 's!=NONE/!=!g' php-fpm.conf.default | tee php-fpm.conf > /dev/null; \

		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'error_log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo '; if we send this to /proc/self/fd/1, it never appears'; \
		echo 'access.log = /proc/self/fd/2'; \
		echo; \
		echo 'clear_env = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '; Ensure worker stdout and stderr are sent to the main error log.'; \
		echo 'catch_workers_output = yes'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/docker.conf \

		echo '[global]'; \
		echo 'daemonize = no'; \
		echo; \
		echo '[www]'; \
		echo 'listen = [::]:9000'; \
	} | tee php-fpm.d/zz-docker.conf
```

#### `a9fabd961a78805cc9a3dba1aa2f14285c0861808a1b6f1a0df46c8e654b2a0d`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

-	Created: Tue, 24 May 2016 04:36:55 GMT

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& buildDeps=" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_BUILD_DEPS \
		libcurl4-openssl-dev \
		libedit-dev \
		libsqlite3-dev \
		libssl-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		xz-utils \
	" \
	&& apt-get update && apt-get install -y $buildDeps --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src/php \
	&& tar -xf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src/php --strip-components=1 \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(nproc)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -executable -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& apt-get purge -y --auto-remove -o APT::AutoRemove::RecommendsImportant=false -o APT::AutoRemove::SuggestsImportant=false $buildDeps
```

```dockerfile
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \

	&& make install \
```
```dockerfile
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \

	&& runDeps="$( \
```

#### `02b7900eb21e0f58cf017353bce3a937e355700fb28632dbb35f550716d202ee`

```dockerfile
RUN set -xe \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .build-deps \
		$PHPIZE_DEPS \
		curl-dev \
		gnupg \
		libedit-dev \
		libxml2-dev \
		openssl-dev \
		sqlite-dev \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& echo "$PHP_SHA256 *$PHP_FILENAME" | sha256sum -c - \
	&& curl -fSL "http://php.net/get/$PHP_FILENAME.asc/from/this/mirror" -o "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)" \
	&& for key in $GPG_KEYS; do \
		gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys "$key"; \
	done \
	&& gpg --batch --verify "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" "$PHP_FILENAME.asc" \
	&& mkdir -p /usr/src \
	&& tar -Jxf "$PHP_FILENAME" -C /usr/src \
	&& mv "/usr/src/php-$PHP_VERSION" /usr/src/php \
	&& rm "$PHP_FILENAME" \
	&& cd /usr/src/php \
	&& ./configure \
		--with-config-file-path="$PHP_INI_DIR" \
		--with-config-file-scan-dir="$PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d" \
		$PHP_EXTRA_CONFIGURE_ARGS \
		--disable-cgi \
		--enable-mysqlnd \
		--enable-mbstring \
		--with-curl \
		--with-libedit \
		--with-openssl \
		--with-zlib \
	&& make -j"$(getconf _NPROCESSORS_ONLN)" \
	&& make install \
	&& { find /usr/local/bin /usr/local/sbin -type f -perm +0111 -exec strip --strip-all '{}' + || true; } \
	&& make clean \
	&& runDeps="$( \
		scanelf --needed --nobanner --recursive /usr/local \
			| awk '{ gsub(/,/, "\nso:", $2); print "so:" $2 }' \
			| sort -u \
			| xargs -r apk info --installed \
			| sort -u \
	)" \
	&& apk add --no-cache --virtual .php-rundeps $runDeps \
	&& apk del .build-deps
```
